commits.message:
Laminas RESTful methods handling (#2322)

* fix: Strictly check variable type (See Notes)

Note: Fixes "Error thrown in ddtrace's closure defined at /opt/datadog-php/dd-trace-sources/bridge/_generated_integrations.php:4423 for Laminas\View\Renderer\JsonRenderer::render(): Call to a member function getTemplate() on array"

* feat: Add error type as resource to `laminas.mvcEvent.setError` spans

* style: Clean useless PR changes

* feat: Trace RESTful methods and capture ApiProblem as errors

* fix: Don't use obstart (too risky)

* test: Add REST endpoints tests

* test: Push phpunit.xml

* fix: Handle absent Laminas Mvc Application

* test: Set 755 permissions on data/cache dir post-autoload dump

* test: Push data/cache/.gitkeep

* test: Replace /home/circleci/app by /home/circleci/datadog

* test: Run ApiTools tests for php 8.0+

* test: Separate ApiTools tests from Laminas Framework Tests

pull_request.title: Laminas RESTful methods handling
pull_request.body:
### Description

This PR adds some missing capabilities related to Laminas RESTful methods handling:
- fix: Add missing action to the root span resource name when a RESTful method is called
- feat: Trace method associated with the rest call
- feat: Capture errors associated with RESTful methods

Before:
**5xx**
![image](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-php/assets/42672104/3c3c6ea8-ba9b-4889-adca-094f4510df68)

**4xx**
![image](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-php/assets/42672104/0f0b2949-9bd7-436c-af5e-3d35881f2f0c)

After:
**5xx**
![image](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-php/assets/42672104/90e9e93d-21d2-415c-bf16-0045154e662f)

**4xx**
![image](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-php/assets/42672104/0db2f2e3-48c6-47bf-bd2c-79f5cd735b67)


### Readiness checklist
- [X] (only for Members) Changelog has been added to the release document.
- [X] Tests added for this feature/bug.

### Reviewer checklist
- [X] Appropriate labels assigned.
- [X] Milestone is set.
- [X] Changelog has been added to the release document. For community contributors the reviewer is in charge of this task.

comment.body:
## Snapshots difference summary

The following differences have been observed in committed snapshots. It is meant to help the reviewer.
The diff is simplistic, so please check some files anyway while we improve it.

pull_request.title: Add a configuration flag to disable laravel queue distributed tracing
pull_request.body:
### Description

Add `DD_TRACE_LARAVEL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTED_TRACING` (defaults to **true**), which disables the creation of an additional `laravel.queue.process` span and relies solely on span links. 

### Readiness checklist
- [X] (only for Members) Changelog has been added to the release document.
- [X] Tests added for this feature/bug.

### Reviewer checklist
- [X] Appropriate labels assigned.
- [X] Milestone is set.
- [X] Changelog has been added to the release document. For community contributors the reviewer is in charge of this task.

commits.message:
Add a configuration flag to disable laravel queue distributed tracing (#2304)

* :sparkles: Add DD_TRACE_LARAVEL_QUEUE_SPAN_LINKS

* Log the serialized span links

* debug: Nullify EG(exception) during span link generation

* Cleanup everything

* style: Change the configuration flag name to `DD_TRACE_LARAVEL_QUEUE_DISTRIBUTED_TRACING`

* style: Remove debug options + indentation

* fix: typo

* test: Add a regression test

* test: Add another regression test

* fix: test formatting rules

* fix: revert changes that shouldn't have been made

* Simplify a condition

* Use SpanLink::fromHeaders

---------

Signed-off-by: Bob Weinand <bob.weinand@datadoghq.com>
Co-authored-by: Bob Weinand <bob.weinand@datadoghq.com>

Avoid %.*s in places where longer strings are used (#2330)

Before https://github.com/php/php-src/commit/e14fbc84acef9a14283986d47433ed7de45b4033 (i.e. PHP 8.1) strings provided with a max length were always truncated at 500 chars

Co-authored-by: Florian Engelhardt <florian.engelhardt@datadoghq.com>

Add Magento 2 Integration (#2274)

* Generate integration artifact

* Add laminas deferred loading on Application::bootstrap

* Start the magento integration (wip++)

* Play with blocks

* Revert "Play with blocks"

This reverts commit 2013054cbd706ba52da75b49ae57c602d2da1832.

* Play with blocks

* Load magento on Magento\Framework\Console\Cli::__construct

* Remove some hooks

* Trace events

* Trace plugins

* Comment-out plugins tracing

* Add test framework

* Update docker images with required PHP extensions

* fix: install sodium for PHP 7.2+

* fix: Install intl using pecl (7.0) and downgrade redis to 5.6

* test: Add Magento 2.4 snapshots

* fix: only install intl for php 7.1+

* test: Add Magento 2.3 test framework + snapshots + installation instructions

Notes: Too old; incompatibility with composer

* fix: Use sudo to set permissions

* test: Ignore 'magento.block.cache_key'

* test: Ignore 'meta.magento.block.cache_key'

* feat: Use DD_HTTP_SERVER_ROUTE_BASED_NAMING

* test: Update snapshots

* test: Ignore exception if GD library is not installed

* fix: Typo in the IntegrationsLoader

* debug: error log nginx config file content

* fix: typo

* style: Remove semi-colon from magento.area.get if there is no area

* style: Refactor using MagentoIntegration::getRealClass

* test: General duplication refactor

* debug: Check that the nginx process has started and is listening

* debug: Add error log

* debug: Remove error log

* debug: Change nginx-default.conf

* debug: Enable DD_TRACE_DEBUG in Laravel 9+ tests

* style: lint

* debug: Don't run magento tests

* Revert "debug: Don't run magento tests"

This reverts commit 461a7a5dc44e21c388ba9ed8afda15c89ceed2df.

* debug: Remove Magento 2.3 test framework

* debug: Totally remove magento test suites

* Revert "debug: Totally remove magento test suites"

This reverts commit 8400073608b511904bec07fbf03dc10e921afb1f.

* debug: Remove test files from Magento 2.4 test framework

* Revert "debug: Remove Magento 2.3 test framework"

This reverts commit b71e00c50cc42902360a24a28b3c1a028a249165.

* debug: Remove test files from Magento 2.3 test framework

* debug: Remove non-necessary files from Magento 2.3 test framework

* debug: Error log config content

* debug: Use dirname

* Revert "debug: Use dirname"

This reverts commit 8d711def41068f58360b478a1bb8a009c7dbb477.

* debug: Use the root path instead of a tmp dir

* debug: Change the web test order

* debug: Change the web test order

* debug: Desperate attempts at this point

* Revert "debug: Remove Magento Test Frameworks"

This reverts commit 605e8810099eaf0ea396ea50701c855eddc87224.

* debug: Increase nginx error verbosity level to debug

* test: Add a .env to Laravel 8x test framework

* test: Add a .env to Laravel 8x test framework

* test: Change the Laravel `.env` files

* debug: Add debug logs to Laravel 8x

* debug: Set open_basedir :shrug:

* debug: Remove open_basedir inis

* debug: Remove test framekworks

* debug: Change laravel .env

* Revert "debug: Remove test framekworks"

This reverts commit d9e9e4031a2b7e2e1fc186780fb6542608ea7c7b.

* :white_check_mark: Add .env files to laravel test frameworks (9+)

* :mute: Remove debug logs

* :white_check_mark: Add .env to Laravel 8 Tests

* :wrench: Run the nette 24 test first

* :wrench: Change Laravel 8 .env DB info

* :wrench: Change Laravel 8 .env DB info

* :hammer: Wait for nginx's process to start/terminate

* :hammer: Use start instead of run

* Increase nginx worker connections

* Try to prevent nginx memory issues

Note: This workaround doesn't workaround

* Play with nginx configurations

* Play with nginx configurations

* Remove .user.ini files

* Remove the magento 2.3 test framework

* Increase the memory limit when nginx server is used

This reverts commit aaed36cbc3072ccec0437384b92ec7f14f4d92a2.

* zip it all

* :green_heart: Add lstat_stat_variation15.phpt to 8.1 xfail list

* :recycle: Clean before ready for review

* :sparkles: Load symfony on commands

pull_request.title: Avoid %.*s in places where longer strings are used
pull_request.body:
### Description

Before https://github.com/php/php-src/commit/e14fbc84acef9a14283986d47433ed7de45b4033 (i.e. PHP 8.1) strings provided with a max length were always truncated at 500 chars.

Note: libdatadog submodule updated for commit https://github.com/DataDog/libdatadog/commit/c9a8afc839e23a49a8e9358949587027b64f676c.

pull_request.title: fix(profiling) flaky exception correctness test
pull_request.body:
### Description

There was a typo in the `DD_PROFILING_EXPERIMENTAL_EXCEPTION_SAMPLING_DISTANCE`:

```diff
- SAMLPING
+ SAMPLING
```

Which was why the test was flaky

### Readiness checklist
- [x] (only for Members) Changelog has been added to the release document.
- [x] Tests added for this feature/bug.

### Reviewer checklist

- [x] Milestone is set.

comment.body:
## Benchmarks

Benchmark execution time: 2023-10-27 07:25:32

Comparing candidate commit f3fae7f68a9c027388a8ae3acc6f8a7d862fcc6e in PR branch `florian/fix-flaky-exception-correctness` with baseline commit a9f89129c76f1f80c9fdc02cd9cd25ac610bef82 in branch `master`.

Found 0 performance improvements and 0 performance regressions! Performance is the same for 18 metrics, 3 unstable metrics.
